quiz_rules: A participant can attempt a particular quiz exactly once.
Each question must be answered within the allocated time, or it will be skipped.
Switching browser tabs during the quiz may result in penalties or disqualification.
Correct answers earn points; incorrect answers do not incur negative marking.
Quizzes can be either open to all or password-protected for private access.
Participants cannot edit their responses after submitting an answer.
The leaderboard will display the top scorers after quiz completion.
Final results will be available only after the quiz ends and cannot be contested.
